Title: The Weigh Station
Writer: Michael Brandt (developed by), Derek Haas (developed by), Dick Wolf (created by), Matt Olmstead (created by), Mike Batistick
Actors: Jason Beghe, Jon Seda, Sophia Bush, Jesse Lee Soffer
Plot: The bounty on Halstead's head becomes a serious reality as an innocent bartender takes a bullet meant for him. Olinsky tries to reason with Bembenek to call off the hit, to no avail. Voight...
